SPDR Gold Shares.description: An ETF tracking the price of gold bullion, providing exposure to the precious metals market.

Lion-OCBC Securities Singapore Low Carbo.description: An ETF focusing on Singapore companies with lower carbon footprints compared to sector peers.

Lion-OCBC Securities Hang Seng TECH ETF.description: An ETF tracking the Hang Seng TECH Index, providing exposure to the 30 largest technology companies in Hong Kong.

Nikko AM Singapore STI ETF.description: An ETF tracking the Straits Times Index, providing exposure to the Singapore stock market.

iShares MSCI India Climate Transition ET.description: An ETF focused on Indian companies that are aligned with the transition to a low carbon economy.

CSOP FTSE Asia Pacific Low Carbon Index.description: An ETF tracking companies with low carbon footprint across the Asia Pacific region.

Xtrackers MSCI China UCITS ETF 1C.description: An ETF providing exposure to large and mid-cap companies from mainland China.

Lion-OCBC Securities China Leaders ETF.description: An ETF focusing on leading Chinese companies across various sectors.

NikkoAM-StraitsTrading MSCI China Electr.description: An ETF targeting Chinese companies in the electric vehicle and mobile technology sectors.

CSOP CSI STAR and CHINEXT 50 index ETF.description: An ETF tracking innovative and high-growth Chinese companies listed on the STAR and ChiNext boards.
